titles.title: Timely Access to Care Act of 2006
A bill to amend the Social Security Act to waive the 24-month waiting period for Medicare coverage of individuals disabled by reason of exposure to tremolite asbestos.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 8/3/2006--Introduced. Timely Access to Care Act of 2006 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) to waive the 24-month waiting period for Medicare coverage of individuals disabled by reason of exposure to tremolite asbestos.
